meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the period following the fall of communism in a particular country or region.
meanings.sent1: The postcommunist government focused on rebuilding the economy.
meanings.sent2: Many buildings in the city show postcommunist architecture.
meanings.sent3: The postcommunist party had a reunion to celebrate their achievements.
meanings.sent4: Her style was a mix of modern and postcommunist influences.
meanings.sent5: The postcommunist era brought significant changes to the society.

meanings.definition: A person who lived through or was influenced by the period following the fall of communism.
meanings.sent1: She was a postcommunist who witnessed the changes firsthand.
meanings.sent2: Postcommunists often share stories of their experiences.
meanings.sent3: The postcommunist at the event shared nostalgic memories.
meanings.sent4: He considered himself a postcommunist historian.
meanings.sent5: The postcommunist reflected on the challenges of the transition period.
